channel.title: Shit, i need help
channel.description:
[b]Okay, my Windows XP has been dropped down to its last 7 days, so I can't use the internetz. I need something that can activate it. Please, MITB, I need something within that time[/b]
ALSO:::::: My internet stopped working, I think it's because I'm down to my last 7 days of Activation. If it is not it, How do I fix it!!!! It just stopped working when my sister started using it, I blame it on her but IDK Help!!! I can't see any wireless networks in range.
My computer is being jacked up right now

item.title: Shit, i need help
item.dc:creator: @Jeebles Jeebles
item.description:
@Jeebles wrote:

[quote=“Exception, post:51, topic:142820”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=195405.msg1765985#msg1765985 date=1190165763]
Oh, so anyone that can’t get it working is non-intelligent, or arrogant despite their hardware not being capable? Why don’t you think before you post?
[/quote]
Because I’m the one who tried to help him set Linux up. He told me something about it being retarded and that he reinstalled Windows instead.[/quote]

I don’t remember that, I remember installing ubuntu awhile ago and it was retarded, but I didn’t know you at the time and it was Fasga who helped me out. Then I looked into other distros which were much better and worked for me. In case you didn’t know, using linux doesn’t make you more intelligent or a better person.

Read full topic

[quote=“Exception, post:17, topic:142820”][quote author=Jeebles link=topic=195405.msg1756557#msg1756557 date=1189818042]
Don’t bother with linux, www.torrentz.com search windows xp pro and click the first result, should be something like windows xp pro corp, worked fine for me no activation too.
[/quote]
Just because your not intelligent enough to get Linux working, or too arrogant to even try it, doesn’t mean you should discourage others from using it.[/quote]

Oh, so anyone that can’t get it working is non-intelligent, or arrogant despite their hardware not being capable? Why don’t you think before you post?

item.title: Shit, i need help
item.dc:creator: @The_Solid The Solid
item.description:
@The_Solid wrote:

How do I format? Everytime I try it, it keeps saying:

Windows cannot fromat this drive. Quit any disk utilites or othjer programs that are using this drive, and make sure that no window is displaying the contents of this drive. Then try formatting again. [br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 12:51:09 PM[/size][hr]Okay we formatted and reinstalled xp. We still cannot detect any wireless netwroks ><

Read full topic

item.title: Shit, i need help
item.dc:creator: @maru maru
item.description:
@maru wrote:

Seeing as I have had to install XP a few times today, with no legit copy, I’ll tell you how to get round it. On the activation screen there should be an option to do it by telephone. Do it that way, then, if it doesn’t work, you’ll be connected to a MSoft call center based in India. Here, just ask for an activation code after they have asked Windows version and your installation ID. You will understand it when you give it a try. Also, the phone call is free from a land based line. Note though, the department for activation is only open Mondays to Fridays.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Shit, i need help
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

Well, here goes my last idea:

Go to the “system32” folder (C:\WINDOWS\system32) and find the thing named “LegitControlCheck.dll”, delete it. Then go here, scroll down a bit and click “Download the latest WGA Notifications Tool”. Download it, run it, reboot, and tell me if you still get the message then.

Read full topic
